#summary Arduino libraries which can be used for other projects

= Arduino libraries =

ArduRCT uses a number of libraries. They have been developped to be as generic as possible. Each one provides a number of examples to better understand the usage of the library.

[LCD_PCD8544]br
A library to drive a Nokia 3110 graphical screen which uses the PCD8544 driver. Such a screen can be found at [http://www.sparkfun.com Sparkfun]  under sku: [http://www.sparkfun.com/products/10168 LCD-10168].
